properties.name: 1025 S Waterford Drive
properties.address_full: 1025 South Waterford Drive, Florissant, MO, USA
properties.marketing_message:
Welcome to your new home at 1025 South Waterford Drive in the heart of Florissant! This updated and move-in-ready 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home offers comfortable living in a fantastic location within the Ferguson-Florissant School District. Enjoy 984 square feet of well-designed living space, featuring a full, partially finished basement perfect for a variety of uses. You'll love the convenience of central AC, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, refrigerator, and stove/oven, and the ease of tile floors throughout.

This home boasts a large backyard ideal for relaxing or entertaining, plus off-street parking and an attached garage. Laundry hookups, a pantry, and washer/dryer hookups add to the convenience. Located close to shopping, dining and major highways, everything you need is within easy reach. Small pets are welcome with a pet fee and monthly pet rent. Don’t miss this opportunity to live in a great space in a desirable community! Contact us today to schedule a viewing!
properties.marketing_amenities: Central AC, Dishwasher, Large Back Yard, Laundry Hookups, Pantry, Partially Finished Basement, Refrigerator, Stove & Oven, Tile Floors, Washer & Dryer Hookups
properties.marketing_pets_policy: Pets allowed with pet fee and additional pet rent.
properties.utilities_tenant_paid: Electric, Gas, Water, Sewer, Trash, Recycle, Landscaping, Grass Mowing, Snow Removal Services

properties.name: 1035 S Waterford Drive
properties.address_full: 1035 South Waterford Drive, Florissant, MO, USA
properties.marketing_message: Welcome home to 1035 South Waterford Drive in desirable Florissant! This updated and inviting 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home offers comfortable living in a fantastic location. Enjoy 984 square feet of freshly updated space, perfect for everyday living. Features include central AC to keep you cool, a covered porch for relaxing outdoors, and a large backyard ideal for entertaining. You'll also find convenient laundry hookups, a refrigerator, and a stove & oven. Parking is a breeze with off-street parking and a tuck-under garage. This home offers a full, unfinished basement with tons of potential. Easy access to shopping and highways, making your commute and errands a breeze. Pets are welcome with a pet fee and additional pet rent. Don't miss out on this great place to call home!

properties.name: 2201 Gaebler B Avenue
properties.marketing_message: Welcome home to 2201 Gaebler Avenue in Overland! This charming 2-bedroom, 1-bath home in the desirable Ritenour School District offers a fresh, updated living experience. Featuring 710 square feet of comfortable living space, you'll find everything you need, including central AC, a dishwasher, refrigerator, stove & oven, and convenient laundry hookups. Enjoy the ease of off-street parking and a full, unfinished basement for extra storage. This property is pet-friendly (with applicable fees), making it perfect for the whole family. Located close to shopping and major highways, you’ll have easy access to everything the St. Louis metro area has to offer. Make this your home and enjoy the convenience and comfort of a well-maintained property in a fantastic location!
